name: Novi Nurfauziaaaaah ❤️
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: Happy birthday! May your heart be filled with positive vibes today, and I hope all your wishes come true. Love you forever! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many blah blah......
text2: That's what I was going to do on Whatsapp.
text4: Even though I’m not able to spend your birthday with you this year ..I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I still consider myself to be the luckiest guy in the world to have a wonderful sweetheart like you...
replayText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it. Or refresh the page, if you want to watch it again.
